channel.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
channel.description:
So im a co-owner of a server me and a friend decided to host, our last server used deathlypvpz v2, we decided to move up to v4.. so normally everything works fine the first time i code it, well with the v4 Ive had alot more problems, some i easily fixed the rest are just pissing me off.
Its been months since ive coded a Pi, so im a little rusty. im positive the error is on my hands but im not sure where im going wrong.
One of the most annoying is the shops, i cannot buy from the shop at all and im not sure why.. ill post my code from action handler & shop.cfg
[sup]shop = 1 General_Store 2 2 787 100 8007 100[/sup]
[sup] case 520: case 522: c.getShops().openShop(1); break;[/sup]
the second problem i keep encountering is the worlds, on v2 i could easily disable a world and now i cannot seem to do so, ive searched the entire client files and still nothing, im thinking its in source files, but as i said i have not coded in so long.

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Somehow its fixed, im assuming i deleted something important in actionhandler, once i changed the shop, npc, it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

variable name loaded from the shophandler is generally “ShopBModifier”

check to see what variable is loaded during the parsing of the shops file in the loadShops() method

then check shopassistant class to see if its checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

vain ill be honest here, ive never once had to mess with shophandler so i have no idea how to do that, i opened shophandler.java and .class and saw nothing regarding buy modifiers.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

check to see which buy modifiers are being checked in the shophandler class

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Ah sorry i thought you have a different problem but i say shop isn’t coded

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

case 520 is a shop keeper aswell as case 522. 787 is a bank certificate for 2billion coins, and 8007 is a home teletab.

perhaps it is being caused by itemdef2 in the client, i changed the names of two items heres the code in itemdef2.

[sup] if(i == 787)
{
itemdef.name = “@yel@2b Certificate”;
itemdef.itemActions[1] = “Sell”;
itemdef.description = “Sell this to any store for 2billion coins.”;
}

    if(i == 8007)
    {
        itemdef.name = "@blu@Home Teletab";
       itemdef.description = "Break this to teleport home";
    }[/sup]

correction, its not a problem in the client, i removed the itemdef2 and still cannot purchase items. but i can sell items to the store.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting quite pissed off.. Help?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

What is the case 520 and 520? is it npc? and in the shop cfg what every number says?

So im a co-owner of a server me and a friend decided to host, our last server used deathlypvpz v2, we decided to move up to v4… so normally everything works fine the first time i code it, well with the v4 Ive had alot more problems, some i easily fixed the rest are just pissing me off.

One of the most annoying is the shops, i cannot buy from the shop at all and im not sure why… ill post my code from action handler & shop.cfg

case 522:
c.getShops().openShop(1);
break;[/sup]

the second problem i keep encountering is the worlds, on v2 i could easily disable a world and now i cannot seem to do so, ive searched the entire client files and still nothing, im thinking its in source files, but as i said i have not coded in so long.
